com.iota.iri.service.snapshot

Interface LocalSnapshotManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalSnapshotManagerImpl

    public interface LocalSnapshotManager
    Represents the manager for local Snapshots that takes care of periodically creating a new Snapshot when the configured interval has passed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void shutdown()
      Stops the Thread that takes care of creating the local Snapshots and that was spawned by the start(MilestoneTracker) method.
      void start(MilestoneTracker milestoneTracker)
      Starts the automatic creation of local Snapshots by spawning a background Thread, that periodically checks if the last snapshot is older than SnapshotConfig.getLocalSnapshotsIntervalSynced().

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start(MilestoneTracker milestoneTracker)
        Starts the automatic creation of local Snapshots by spawning a background Thread, that periodically checks if the last snapshot is older than SnapshotConfig.getLocalSnapshotsIntervalSynced(). When we detect that it is time for a local snapshot we internally trigger its creation. Note: If the node is not fully synced we use SnapshotConfig.getLocalSnapshotsIntervalUnsynced() instead.
        Parameters:
        milestoneTracker - tracker for the milestones to determine when a new local snapshot is due

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Stops the Thread that takes care of creating the local Snapshots and that was spawned by the start(MilestoneTracker) method.
